Kount\Ris

Class Kount_Ris_Request

public abstract class Kount_Ris_Request

Common base class for Kount_Ris_Inquiry and Kount_Ris_Update objects.
CURL support must be enabled.

Package: Kount
Subpackage: Ris
Author: Kount <custserv@kount.com>
Version: $Id: Request.php 19026 2012-03-29 22:37:30Z mmn $
Copyright: 2012 Kount, Inc. All Rights Reserved.
See: Kount_Ris_Inquiry
See: Kount_Ris_Update

Method Detail

__construct

public void __construct(Kount_Ris_Settings $settings=null)

Constructor.

If no explicit configuration settings are provided we will attempt to read defaults from an ini file using Kount_Util_ConfigFileReader.
See Kount_Util_ConfigFileReader for details on setting an alternate path for this file.

Parameters

$settings - Configuration settings
